item.description:
So you think "it's" in their kiss? Ever changed your mind about someone because they're a good dancer? Nothing is sexier than someone who knows how to move on the dancefloor!

If you've watched "Dancing With the Stars," you know you don't need experience to learn to be a good dancer! Have you wondered just how they do it? Well, now's your chance to give it a whirl! Impress your next date! Learn for the upcoming New Year's parties!

You will get a ONE AND A HALF HOUR LESSON of SWING, DISCO/HUSTLE and SALSA followed by open dancing at this session. You don't need to bring a partner! Put on your dancing shoes! (no sneakers)Get there early (7:15 pm) and pay at the door. Just $10. BYOB, snacks provided. They have a 3,500 sq ft dance floor. A table is reserved for us!

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Let's Dance! The Cure For Two Left Feet Nite
